mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (fullName, name_ruby, nickname, email_address, address, age, gender, remark, is_deleted) VALUES (#{fullName}, #{nameRuby}, #{nickname}, #{emailAddress}, #{address}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false)
INSERT INTO student_courses (student_id, course_name, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET fullName = #{fullName}, name_ruby = #{nameRuby}, nickname = #{nickname}, email_address = #{emailAddress}, address = #{address}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
